nodes.bodyText: I think it would make sense to prepare the code for environment currently stopping. As I see env service will wait until datahubs etc. are stopped so it may take a considerable amount if time until it is stopped.
And maybe env starting should also be filtered out, as the env might only partially be functional.

Also it might be a good idea to collect all the env statuses to a list where the poller
should immediately exit + we should not allow creation. I'm guessing the 2 list should be identical.
